name: Super Sonic Hatchet Man
description:
Please use a controller to take full advantage:

Face button bottom: Jump

Face button right: boost

Right trigger: accelerate

Left trigger: decelerate

Left bumper: air roll

Left stick: Steer

Right stick: control camera

 

Keyboard:

WASD movement

 

Try to hit the enemies and kill the enemy car in order to get more time on the timer!
